articles.content:

articles.title: Tod's plans to delist from Milan stock exchange - Financial Times
articles.description: Italian luxury group agrees deal to go private with LVMH-backed private equity firm L Catterton
articles.content:
Italian luxury bag and shoemaker Tods plans to go private in a deal with LVMH-backed private equity firm L Catterton, ending more than two decades as a public company on the Milan stock exchange.
